sentences.en: a magazine with a zippy title
It praised the Smart for its styling, economy, zippy handling and ability to park almost anywhere.
sentences.cn: 它对智能车的外型, 经济, 驾驶“敏捷”和几乎能在任何地方停车而大为赞赏.

sentences.en: Recent revenue growth has been zippy as expected.
sentences.cn: 近期收入正如预期中的一样快速增长.

sentences.en: Sherry is kind of a zippy girl, isn't she?
sentences.cn: 雪莉是个有点儿活泼的女孩, 不是 吗 ?

sentences.en: Stanlake Bacchus 2005 is very well made, super - clean and fruity with England's characteristic zippy acidity.
sentences.cn: Bacchus2005酿造得非常好, 超纯净,葡萄味中带有英格兰特色的清新酸味.

words.tran_cn: 拉链；活力，精力；尖啸声，撕裂声；一种程序压缩的档案文件格式
拉开或拉上；以尖啸声行进
给...以速度；拉上或拉开拉链
